```{python}
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np

np.random.seed(42)
data = pd.DataFrame(np.random.rand(100), columns=['Random Numbers'])

# Updated preview_data function
def preview_data(df):
    head_data = df.head()
    describe_data = df.describe()
    return [head_data, describe_data]

# Call the function to test
output = preview_data(data)
print("Head of DataFrame:")
print(output[0])
print("\nDescription of DataFrame:")
print(output[1])

```
